Pourquoi Dell Technologies crée une division IoT
Tomorrow is my final day at Amazon.
Prior to Amazon, I was a broke college student living on a friend’s futon in Dallas, TX, with no money or car.

Since 2014 with Amazon, I’ve lived in three states (CA, WA, OH), traveled to 11 cities in the last year, supported Executive Recruiting at the Director and VP level, supported a site during a devastating hurricane, hired and developed a successful team, interviewed hundreds of candidates, had a hand in onboarding 3,000+ NASC/NAFC employees, and launched and led Amazon’s first (and best!) site in Cleveland, OH. It's been a wild ride!
But, more importantly, through Amazon I’ve made strong connections globally and have learned a ton about myself- both my strengths and opportunities.
Tomorrow I am leaving this amazing company for my next adventure. I'm excited, nervous, scared, and hungry (probably unrelated).
Work Hard. Have Fun. Make History.
Oh look, another insensitive, wannabe 'woke' ad campaign.

• Strategic & Programmatic HR support to executive leadership team within the Supply Chain organization. Consult to 2 SVPs, 4 VPs, 600 team members in 30 countries.• Support all talent initiatives including: succession, executive development & coaching, performance management, org. design and integration, org. health and pay planning.
Talent Acquisition Sr Advisor - Global Operations

• Full cycle recruiting support for our Global Operations Team (Supply Chain, Logistics & Procurement). Coordination of M&A (Mergers & Acquisitions) recruitment. Part of the Project Management Team during the Quest acquisition.• Partner closely with HR, Compensation, and HR Services.• Providing advice and guidance to managers on strategic and operational TA/HR processes, policies, and procedures.• Leveraging social media/branding for recruiting within our team/Team Leader.
Talent Acquisition Sr Advisor - Dell Software
Full cycle recruiting support for our Dell Software Organization all over the US in the areas of: Software Developers, Software Architects, QA, Product Managers, Usability Engineers...

• Cover end-to-end recruiting processes in France for Sales/Pre-sales roles at all levels in the organization from requisition approval, defining profile requirements in conjunction with local and international hiring managers, managing and executing relevant sourcing strategies in the external marketplace.• Selection and assessment of candidates, complex offer negotiations and on-boarding processes at all levels in the organization.• Coordination of European and Global key recruitment/HR projects (Services Sales Executive, OEM, Contract Management, M&A as Wyse, Force 10, Compellent…) • Social Media Coordination for Southern Europe Region, best practices implementation to drive company branding.

• Recruit and source for a wide variety of non-exempt and exempt positions. Coordinate and maintain recruiting agreements for employment agencies and job boards. Work with local colleges to recruit student interns for temporary assignments.  • Work with managers on organizational changes including job descriptions, position evaluations, compensation, titles and all related paperwork.• Identify and communicate key employee messages, assist in employee relations.• Develop and assist in conducting HR related projects: research resources to assist employees approaching retirement age with pre-retirement planning, provide support to the HR Manager on the Affirmative Action plan, analyze potential cost savings related to numerous employee-related expenses, salary planning recommendations. Enhance Careers section of MMS website for greater marketing potential.• Monitor and review the recruitment budget.
